law.catch_line: Responsibilities of the executive council of the Miami-Dade County Developmental Impact Committee.

text.section:
Sec. 33D-35. Responsibilities of the executive council of the Miami-Dade County Developmental Impact Committee.
The responsibilities of the executive council of the Miami-Dade County Developmental Impact Committee shall be to provide a timely review whereby a determination of vested rights or exemption can be made regarding applications for development actions within the shoreline development review boundary, based on hereinbelow and procedures in implementing resolutions adopted pursuant to this article.
